task.summary: Default task
Simple rgb ui in viewpager. Displays the same on each page but these will change to Rules and RPi pin setup respectively
Created login screen with password reset option
Registration screen complete
Logging in navigates to half finished rgblight activity
Basic model classes to get started on views for different devices and their rules
New dashboard activity will be main hub for devices and rules
New dashboard activity will be main hub for devices and rules
As stated in excel logs for week 3
Skeleton for devices fragment on dashboard
Created view items for devices recyclerview. All are connected to database.
Last commit before major refactor works with interfaces
Refactor device creation with interface
Bug fixes under device control activity
Basic settings for testing (log out, password reset). Created button style resource for less copy pasting. Created edittext style resource for less copy pasting.
Settings screen implementations. Settings screen unimplemented custom views. (Listeners are needed and a dark theme for the app) (design will happen later down the line)

Store recyclerview items order in room database. Finish status recycler view items. Create sensor device fragment.
Start layout and fragment for device setup (pin or ip address).
Scenes. See excel for added features. Week 7 Date 25/03/2020

Scenes. Start work on SceneManager to handle firebase copying of device data. Fnished recyclerview drag and drop. Swipe to dismiss not implemented yet (this will happen later with device deletion, in case data structures change). Changed NewSceneDialogFragment to just SceneDialogFragment. This is now also used to edit which devices are included in the scene. This is also how you can edit the name of the scene.
Finished scenes. Added dark mode.
Started implementing notifications plans. Updated device control pager to only have 2 pages when no notificattions are included with the device (like lamps)
Finished notifications ui and firebase etc
Update views with animations. Add logic to play animations properly.
Fixed views
New device types, no new classes added
Added infra-red remote control device with customisable button codes.

Added coffee machine. Refactored code. Refactored package structure. Fixed crash on older android version. Added more columns support for tablets and larger screens. Extracted string resources. Exctracted colour resources from styles to seperate colours resource file.
Removed value event listener from device control activity when paused, so app doesnt crash
Made device controller fragments observer LiveData of viewmodel. Removed data change interface and listener
Removed room database for lists on the dashboard, adding and removing devices works as intended.
Remove Room database files used for device and sensor identifier storage
Dashboard layouts and views for Thermostat device
Added thermostat device control fragment with layout
Fix thermostat control fragment
Remedy IDE suggestions
Use reflection for notifications property name
Enable topic subscription for new devices
Add Door lock device, derivative of Light
Change email and password login to token based login for RPi
Transfer email and password using RSA encryption
Transfer email and password using RSA encryption
